message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the possibility of selling you this incredible product. I think it's a game-changer, and I'm confident you'll love it. With that said, I'm willing to part with it for $950,000. It's a fair price considering its value to you, and I'm willing to make a compromise to make this deal happen.

Alice, I appreciate your offer, but $950,000 is a bit higher than I'm comfortable with.  I'm willing to pay $850,000 for the product.  This is a fair price considering its value to me and I'm confident we can reach an agreement.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your concerns about the price, but I'm still confident that this product is worth more to you than $850,000. Considering the value it brings to your business, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell it to you for $900,000. This is a fair price, and I believe it's a great opportunity for both of us to come to an agreement.

Alice, I understand your position, but $900,000 is still a bit more than I'm able to pay right now. I'm confident this product will be valuable to my business, and I'm prepared to offer you $875,000. This is a fair price for both of us and allows us to come to an agreement. Let's work together to make this happen.

I understand your concerns, Bob, and I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway. However, I'm still not willing to sell the product for $875,000. Considering the value it brings to your business, I'm willing to make one more compromise. I'm willing to sell it to you for $885,000. This is the lowest price I'm willing to accept, and I believe it's still a great opportunity for both of us to come to an agreement.
